main event: On 6 September 1966, Mr. James C. Gillette reported observing an unidentified flying object (UFO) near his home in Gillette, Wyoming.
interesting points: The UFO was first sighted hovering over a nearby hill., The object made a rapid ascent into the sky before disappearing from view., It was described as oval in shape and approximately 30-40 feet in diameter., The UFO emitted a bright, white light and was silent with no visible means of propulsion., The incident is classified as 'Unidentified' under Project Blue Book guidelines.
sighted object: an oval-shaped UFO emitting a bright, white light
witness description: Mr. James C. Gillette, a farmer and resident of Gillette
